text: Bedok MRT Station (EW5) is an MRT Station in Singapore. It is along the East West MRT Line. Underpasses connect the station to both sides of the road. The station also links to Bedok Mall and the Bedok Bus Interchange. ==Timeline== *4 November 1989: Station opened ==Following stations== Previous: Tanah Merah (EW4) Next: Kembangan (EW6) ==Former codes== Formerly the code was: E8 (1989 - 2001) Category:1989 establishments in Singapore Category:Mass Rapid Transit (Singapore) stations
title: Bedok MRT station
